body_html:
Attempted doing so, still have same error:

(C:\Users\kesav_000\Anaconda3) C:\Users\kesav_000\Documents>conda update conda
Fetching package metadata .............
Solving package specifications: .

Package plan for installation in environment C:\Users\kesav_000\Anaconda3:

The following packages will be SUPERSEDED by a higher-priority channel:

    conda: 4.3.30-py36h7e176b0_0 anaconda --> 4.3.30-py36h7e176b0_0

Proceed ([y]/n)? y

conda-4.3.30-p 100% |###############################| Time: 0:00:00   3.44 MB/s

(C:\Users\kesav_000\Anaconda3) C:\Users\kesav_000\Documents>conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch
Fetching package metadata ...............
Solving package specifications: .

UnsatisfiableError: The following specifications were found to be in conflict:
  - pytorch
Use "conda info <package>" to see the dependencies for each package.

Also tried uninstalling anaconda itself and then reinstalling it to see if that would work. Still no luck. Any alternative ways to do this?

body:
Attempted doing so, still have same error:

```
(C:\Users\kesav_000\Anaconda3) C:\Users\kesav_000\Documents>conda update conda
Fetching package metadata .............
Solving package specifications: .

Package plan for installation in environment C:\Users\kesav_000\Anaconda3:

The following packages will be SUPERSEDED by a higher-priority channel:

    conda: 4.3.30-py36h7e176b0_0 anaconda --> 4.3.30-py36h7e176b0_0

Proceed ([y]/n)? y

conda-4.3.30-p 100% |###############################| Time: 0:00:00   3.44 MB/s

(C:\Users\kesav_000\Anaconda3) C:\Users\kesav_000\Documents>conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch
Fetching package metadata ...............
Solving package specifications: .

UnsatisfiableError: The following specifications were found to be in conflict:
  - pytorch
Use "conda info <package>" to see the dependencies for each package.
```

Also tried uninstalling anaconda itself and then reinstalling it to see if that would work. Still no luck. Any alternative ways to do this?
